<<<code>>>: try { printWriter.write("1\n"); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
<<<explanation>>>: The problem is that you are writing string without a line break. But BufferedReader expects one of the line characters mentioned above which you are not providing. It does output the whole buffer once the end of the stream is reached though. To fix the issue, you need to add a line break after each line you write using PrintWriter.write() method.
